hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #the Broken Sword# and #Double Defense#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #4# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #temporal stone within the Deku Tree# contains #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ After Spinning Log Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Compass#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Ruto's Letter# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Great Fairies outside #Hyrule and Ganon's castles# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
